D

DeadlineSegue<In,Out> - Class in io.avery.conveyor
A StepSegue that uses deadlines to manage timed waits for pushes and pulls, and provides several lifecycle hooks to simplify state management.
DeadlineSegue() - Constructor for class io.avery.conveyor.DeadlineSegue
Constructs a new DeadlineSegue.
DeadlineSegue.SinkController - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A controller for sink-like operations on a DeadlineSegue.
DeadlineSegue.SourceController<Out> - Interface in io.avery.conveyor
A controller for source-like operations on a DeadlineSegue.
delay(Function<? super T, Instant>, int) - Static method in class io.avery.conveyor.Belts
Returns a segue that calculates a deadline for each pushed element, buffering elements at least until their deadline expires.
drainFromSource(Belt.StepSource<? extends In>) - Method in interface io.avery.conveyor.Belt.Sink
Pulls as many elements as possible from the source to this sink.
drainFromSource(Belt.StepSource<? extends In>) - Method in interface io.avery.conveyor.Belt.StepSink
Pulls as many elements as possible from the source to this sink.
drainToSink(Belt.StepSink<? super Out>) - Method in interface io.avery.conveyor.Belt.Source
Pushes as many elements as possible from this source to the sink.
drainToSink(Belt.StepSink<? super Out>) - Method in interface io.avery.conveyor.Belt.StepSource
Pushes as many elements as possible from this source to the sink.
